description.translate: Contemplate the freedom, in this peacock moth, which flees from your macabre form.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Âme en peine\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Contemple la liberté, dans ce paon\"}","{\"text\":\"§7de nuit, qui s'enfuit loin de ta forme macabre.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Contemplate the freedom, in this peacock\"}","{\"text\":\"§7 moth, which flees from your macabre form.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a3 §7DAR§a3 §7HER§c-1\"}"]}}
